ca.weblite.pisces

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.weblite.pisces.Font
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Font.Glyph>

    public class Font
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Font.Glyph>
    Vector fonts must be drawn, and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException on blitting. Bitmap fonts must be blitted, and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException on drawing.
    See Also:
    Psf2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Font.FontProvider
      Interface that can be implemented by any class that wishes to provide fonts to Pisces.
      static interface  Font.Glyph 
      static class  Font.Kind
      Vector or Bitmap
      static class  Font.Type
      Map from font (file) name extension to implementation class.
